Features.WorldMap.Description: Provides options for restricting the usage of the world map.
Features.WorldMap.AllowKeyBinding.Descri: Choose whether players can use the default 'M' key-binding for the world map.
Features.WorldMap.WipeWorldMapAtLogin.De: Wipe the player's world map whenever they log in.
Features.WorldMap.WipeWorldOnDeath.Descr: Wipe the player's world map whenever they die.
Features.WorldMap.WorldMapFogOfWarRadius: Control the distance, in chunks, away from the player the world map will reveal.
Features.WorldMap.WorldMapFogOfWarEnable: Players will only be able to see the world map within a set radius around them.
